In MBC CQRS serverless, we use prisma as: In MBC CQRS serverless, we use prisma as an ORM. It helps developers more productive when working with databases.
A common scenario when working with Pris: A common scenario when working with Prisma is needing to make changes to the database, such as creating tables, updating fields in tables, etc. Follow these steps:
For local development, create and apply: For local development, create and apply migrations with command npm run migrate:dev.
For local development, please make sure: For local development, please make sure to set the correct `DATABASE_URL` environment variable.
You could view [prisma-client documentat: You could view [prisma-client documentation](https://www.prisma.io/docs/orm/prisma-client) for more information
When creating an RDS table that maps to: When creating an RDS table that maps to a DynamoDB table, ensure you add the necessary fields and indexes to the RDS table accordingly.
